title: "AWS Announces Support for PyTorch with Amazon Elastic Inference"
excerpt: "With Amazon’s announcement, PyTorch can now work with Amazon’s SageMaker and EC2 cloud services. PyTorch is the third major deep learning framework to be supported by Amazon Elastic Inference, following in the footsteps of TensorFlow and Apache MXNet."
